description.narrative: This project seeks to establish a consortium of local and national based organisations, each having a key technical competency evidenced by a clear track record on specific area of identified work. The project will bring together human rights education and human rights monitors working at the community level (who have the trust and confidence of the community and existing structures for community entry built over time) with lawyers at the national level (who have experience in human rights litigation including strategic litigation at national & international levels) to ensure that a culture of respect for human rights is cultivated at the community level through taking up of cases for litigation (identified at the community level).

mailing-address.narrative: Trócaire Head Office, Maynooth, Co. Kildare, W23 NX63, Ireland,
